about_the_game:
Control two window cleaners, Klenley and Ness, tethered to one another in this physics-based platformer. Use your momentum to swing, launch, and clean your way through a variety of cityscapes.

Master the swing and discover new ways to traverse each level. Avoid obstacles and clean grime in record time to earn cash and unlock new jobs. Each city brings with it new challenges and unique scenery to explore.

Some notes from The Boss:

  • Throw caution to the wind and finish your job with no regard for safety standards. Seriously, I want this job done quick.
  • YeeeOUCH! That looked like it hurt. But they do say pain is the best teacher. So I guess you learned your lesson, huh?
  • They also say a job half-done is as good as none. Well, I say screw 'em! If you want to wrap up a job half-done, be my guest.
  • But if you do feel like cleaning more, I'll pay you extra. Just be quick about it. I'm a busy man.
  • Finally, there’s no ‘i’ in “team” but there are two in “SQUiiGEE”… I’m not going anywhere with that, I just felt like sharing the thought.
detailed_description:
Control two window cleaners, Klenley and Ness, tethered to one another in this physics-based platformer. Use your momentum to swing, launch, and clean your way through a variety of cityscapes.

Master the swing and discover new ways to traverse each level. Avoid obstacles and clean grime in record time to earn cash and unlock new jobs. Each city brings with it new challenges and unique scenery to explore.

Some notes from The Boss:

  • Throw caution to the wind and finish your job with no regard for safety standards. Seriously, I want this job done quick.
  • YeeeOUCH! That looked like it hurt. But they do say pain is the best teacher. So I guess you learned your lesson, huh?
  • They also say a job half-done is as good as none. Well, I say screw 'em! If you want to wrap up a job half-done, be my guest.
  • But if you do feel like cleaning more, I'll pay you extra. Just be quick about it. I'm a busy man.
  • Finally, there’s no ‘i’ in “team” but there are two in “SQUiiGEE”… I’m not going anywhere with that, I just felt like sharing the thought.
name: Squiigee

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3GHz+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 6GB
  • Storage: 350 MB available space

short_description: Use your momentum to swing, launch and fly, cleaning cityscapes in record time to earn some sweet, sweet cash!
